posts.author: ozdallo
posts.content:
Thought I'd post this module here since it was designed for post-20 characters.  Good story-driven hack/slash.

https://neverwintervault.org/project/nw ... ona-rising

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
I have heard about his module but never played it myself, it is one of the very few epic modules out there and that by itself makes it rare.
Any other info about it would be appreciated ozdallo.

posts.author: ozdallo
posts.content: Not sure what to tell you, Valefor.  The mod is designed for you to respawn rather than reload.  Has a cool death plane which gives you the choice to return to point of death or to a bindstone.  Probably the most consistently beautiful mod out there.  Single hench.  Class sets.  Rated 2nd best mod ever by the NwN community for cutscenes.  Convo editor says 400k words of dialogue, though obviously the player will see only a fraction of that.  Well designed combat.  Linear at the start and end but about 1/2 of the mod is completely non-linear, so lots to explore.  Heaps of custom items and creatures.  It's a unique world and story line but does draw much on FR.  It has layers of possible immersion, from item descriptions to monster descriptions.  Has an offensive sequencer, which was considered impossible at the time.  Heaps of other stuff...  :)

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: You have told us a lot with your second answer ozdallo, and in a fast and efficient manner as well, now you made me want to play the game again!

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content: Aye - I'll also have to give it a look. Thanks ozdallo!

posts.author: ozdallo
posts.content: Ha!  Inspired myself.  Replaying as a straight wiz.

posts.author: Shia_Luck
posts.content:
I rememeber loving this. Is it MP and, more importantly, EE compatible? Does anyone have experience?

Have fun :)

posts.author: ozdallo
posts.content: SP only.  It plays ok with EE, though there have been a couple of reports of crashes during cutscenes.  Cheers, Shia_Luck.  I remember your name :)

posts.author: Shia_Luck
posts.content:
And I yours, Dallo. :) Thanks for the info .  Shame for my MP group but I will enjoy it again soon I am sure.

Have fun :)

posts.author: Shia_Luck
posts.content:
Hmm, can't edit my post... ok. Well, anyway.. I added it to the Steam "Modules you should play" thread now you confirmed it works in EE.  (Which would have been a much better name than the one I gave it, but anyway *grin*.)  https://steamcommunity.com/app/704450/d ... 687011593/

Have fun :)
